text: I stand with the @HispanicCaucus to recognize the 10th Anniversary of DACA. Senate: It‚Äôs time to pass the Dream and Promise Act and create pathways to citizenship, including for DACA recipients! #NoSonOlvidados

The latest information regarding an alleged split in the Jan 6th Committee regarding whether criminal charges will be referred to the DOJ is disturbing. I sincerely believe that Trump has committed crimes, and the committee has enough evidence to refer these crimes to the DOJ.

In honor of Women Veterans Day, I am exploring ways to improve women veterans' services. I am proud I created the Center for Women Veterans in 1994 to serve women veterans who have been neglected for far too long. More to Come.

The Jan 6th Committee aired its first hearing. Chair Thompson & Vice-Chair Cheney were absolutely strong and credible. The revelations given by AG Barr, Ivanka, & Jason Miller were startling. This Jan 6th Committee will create a nationwide discussion & Trump will be exposed.

Help Democrats pass the Protecting Our Kids Act, H.R. 7910.

This comprehensive bill includes The Untraceable Firearms Act, The Safe Guns, Safe Kids Act, and several other important pieces of gun safety legislation. We must pass these bills today to keep our children and us safe!
The Summit of the Americas is being held in Los Angeles. Is it going to be pomp and circumstance? Or a real effort to solve the problems of our region? China is watching.

I am having sleepless nights as I continue to get images in my head about innocent people and children being shot or killed in cold blood. I am begging any and all Members of Congress who are NRA supporters to please have a heart and support our gun control bills.

I take great pride in celebrating #PrideMonth. As a board member of Equality PAC, the political arm of the Congressional LGBTQ Equality Caucus, and my long career of advocating for equal rights for the LGBTQ community, as I do every year, I will be marching in Pride!

I joined in the Memorial Day commemoration of 1.1 million servicemen & women who have made the ultimate sacrifice in defense of our country. We must avoid increasing the number of men & women who die in war. Our goal must be the pursuit of diplomacy and peace, not war and death.

How long will we have to endure the destruction of innocent lives by the people we pay to protect and serve us? This disregard for human life cannot continue. The people of the US must demand a stop to this carnage.

Despite George Floyd being killed with a cop's knee on his neck for 9 minutes 2 years ago, the killing of unarmed young Blacks & Latinos in particular continues. The US Senate failed to support police reform. We will continue to fight for justice & the elimination of racist cops.

When will this country come together to denounce and deter the killing of innocent children and adults by heavily armed killers in a society where guns are so easily accessible? Another recent mass killing of 14 children in Uvalde, Texas, by an 18-year-old! Gun Control now!

This is Asian and Pacific Islander Month. I join with the AAPI Community in celebrating their accomplishments! I also join with the AAPI Community in confronting the racism and injustice that is being perpetrated against the AAPI Community. Racism and hatred are wrong, periodt!

The Justice Department has a responsibility to identify and track down white supremacists and domestic terrorists who have taken certain identifiable criminal acts that define them. The FBI must make arrests and follow through with appropriate convictions.
When the justice system acts promptly to apprehend and convict white supremacists who prey upon Black, Asian and other minorities, perhaps this can be a deterrent to the killing of innocent people.

White supremacists are lurking in this country, and Black people, particularly those highly visible, are vulnerable. The right-wing haters must take responsibility for their rhetoric, actions, and hatred against black people.

For many of us, our lives are in danger every day. The attacks and threats we receive from white supremacists are real. This atrocity by a white supremacist in Buffalo is unforgivable and cannot be simply dismissed as insanity.

Happy birthday to my dear friend & genius Stevie Wonder. Thanks Stevie, for Radio Station KJLH. Thanks for the wonderful songs you have entertained us with! Thanks for initiating MLK's birthday celebration. Thanks for your support for freedom, justice, and peace for this country.

Happy Mother‚Äôs Day, mothers everywhere! Thank you to my children & all, who have wished me a Happy Mother‚Äôs Day. Let‚Äôs all remember our mothers do for us what they know how to do. Most of the time, what they do works well, sometimes not so well. However, love conquers everything!

Today the women of this country have gotten the first view of a leaked document from the SCOTUS that basically describes the destruction of Roe v.Wade. This decision will be devastating. Despite the pending decision, women must fight with every breath of life, to resist & resist!
We must all be committed to justice, fairness, equality, and a criminal justice system that respects us and protects us, rather than abuses us.

I will continue in the struggle, for fairness and justice at every level of our society. Despite the threats, I have no fear, and I cannot be intimidated. My life has long been dedicated, to the struggle for equal justice, fairness, and respect.

We need to confront racism, police abuse, and elected officials who fear police organizations and refuse to confront them. We need real public relations programs put forward by police departments to interact with the community, for the community.
Everyone must play a role in changing the police establishment, that for too long has abused its power and taken advantage of having a gun and badge to use against innocent people.
We need to get rid of recycled cops, that go from one jurisdiction to another despite having records of abuse and disregard for the very citizens they are supposed to protect and serve.

We need police reform in this country. We need diversity and inclusion in the Criminal Justice System in this country at every level. We need the United States Congress, to adopt the police reform legislation that has been passed in the House and has been stalled in the Senate.

The George Floyd killing in Minneapolis, the killings of Breonna Taylor, Philando Castile, Sandra Bland, Freddie Gray, Elijah McClain, all of them black, along with the killings of many more Blacks and Latinos, continue to create volatile tension.
I considered the confrontation on these issues to be a renewed resistance to police brutality, and a feeling of having been dropped off of America's agenda.

The question is, has there been any progress since that time? We certainly have changed police chiefs, some better than others! But there is still a lack of trust in the police and situations can still end up with unrest.

My description and discussion of the unrest that took place on April 29th, 1992, described the miserable conditions and police abuse that was so prevalent in Los Angeles and in communities of color in particular.

In the following days, while working on the street, responding to radio calls and telephone interviews, I defined the unrest differently from many outside observers, who claimed the unrest was just a bunch of criminals who wanted to steal and destroy.

I took to the microphones, & I described my understanding of the anger, the distrust, and the feelings of being trapped with nowhere to go. No jobs, no careers, not enough food, and the constant shadow of hostile police, targeting unarmed young black men in particular, for abuse.
The next day I made my way to the Public Housing developments in LA because I knew that the poor people there would be isolated and separated from grocery stores and other resources.

I organized to get food, baby diapers, and medicine to the public housing units in South LA, starting with Nickerson Gardens, Jordan Downs, and Imperial Courts housing projects. I then began to work on getting the lights turned on that had been stopped as a result of the unrest.

I immediately reserved a seat on a plane to Los Angeles. During the plane ride, rumors were being spread, that the plane upon entering LA airspace, was going to be targeted with gunshots as a part of the insurrection that was taking place. The rumors did not prove to be true.

Upon arriving in LA on April 29th, the day the insurrection took place, I saw that the streetlights were out, and water was streaming through the streets. The police were everywhere. I got to my home and prepared to deal with the unrest unfolding in the streets.

Today, I am remembering 30 years ago, I was in Washington D.C. when the news flashed, describing, "LA Riots‚Äù that I referred to as an insurrection, following the nonguilty verdict of the Los Angeles police officers who had viciously beaten Rodney King.

Happy Easter to all the children and their families. Thank you to the White House for opening up to our children, for the White House Easter Egg Roll. I am delighted that the families and children attending will be able to see their President at this special annual celebration!

This day will be remembered in History. There have been 115 SCOTUS Justices, but there has never before been a Black woman Justice. Ketanji Brown Jackson has moved the needle on what is achievable for Black women everywhere. She will be an exemplary Supreme Court Justice!

Trump is such a blatant liar. He said Judge Ketanji Brown Jackson had been ‚Äúunbelievably disrespectful‚Äù towards the GOP senators questioning her. He claimed, ‚Äúshe had total disdain and even hatred for them.‚Äù The world was watching. Even his most ardent followers know he is lying.

Trump is lying again! He lied to his followers at his recent rally in Georgia. He flipped the truth and accused Ketanji Jackson of being disrespectful to GOP Senators who were nice to her. The world was watching, everyone knows better. She was truly attacked by those GOP Senators

How can it be possible, that anyone in their right mind could follow this dishonorable, lying, divisive egomaniac, Donald Trump? If Trump was ever elected again, President of the United States, he would obliterate democracy and devastate & destroy this country.

Today is a new day! For the first time in history, a Black woman is being considered for the Supreme Court. There is no one more qualified, more experienced, and more committed to justice than Judge Ketanji Brown Jackson. I believe the Senate Judiciary Committee will agree.

Enough talk and special days for #EqualPayDay. We need the Equal Rights Amendment. We need to correct the outrageous disparities between white men and women!

For every $1 made by white men:
Women overall make: 73 cents
Latinas: 49 cents
Black women: 58 cents
AAPI women: 75 cents

Each year, I am proud to join women all across the world in celebration of International Women‚Äôs Day. I am pleased to display the pictures of women leaders I‚Äôve been involved with, who were pioneers in the women‚Äôs movement. #InternationalWomensDay https://t.co/urQUq0MqNV

President Biden rose to the occasion in a thorough State of the Union speech, covering all of the important issues that needed to be addressed. Proud of him and proud of Democrats. We are on the right track!

Take a look at my Pinned Tweet. I identified the Kremlin Klan 5 years ago! Trump is responsible for wrapping his arms around Putin and he is leading his followers to support Putin & Russia. Trump must never be re-elected as POTUS or anything else. He is undermining our democracy.

Thank you, Pres. Biden, for nominating a qualified Black woman for the Supreme Court. Her credentials are impeccable & she has been confirmed by the Senate 3 times for other positions. Judge Ketanji Brown Jackson should be swiftly confirmed!

I have received a 100% score as an Environmental Champion from the League of Conservation Voters. I have voted for clean air, clean water, Climate Change, & racial, social, and environmental justice. I believe that we can indeed ‚Äúprotect our planet and everyone who inhabits it.‚Äù

No doubt about it. Putin has invaded The Ukraine. Thanks to Biden for the serious sanctions imposed on Russian sovereign debt and thanks to Germany for imposing critical sanctions by suspending the certification of the Nord Stream 2 pipeline. Putin must be stopped.

The Archivist of the United States confirmed to Chair Maloney of the Oversight Committee that top-secret files were identified among the 15 boxes of documents wrongfully taken to Mar-a-Lago by Trump. This is a potential 5-year felony, and Trump must be held accountable!

The outrageous murder & civil rights violations of Ahmaud Arbery were dealt with in a way that truly speaks to justice. A state court sentenced all 3 murderers to life in prison & a federal court today found them guilty of severe hate crimes. Let this be a lesson for all racists!

Trump, Trump Jr. & Ivanka have been ordered by a NY Supreme Court Justice to testify under oath within 21 days. Trump has cheated, he has lied, he‚Äôs corrupted and ignored the law. Thank you, NY AG Letitia James! We may be on the verge of achieving justice that‚Äôs long overdue.

My condolences to my friend, Tyrese Gibson whose mother passed as a result of COVID. He loved his mother dearly, and he is praying to God to continue to allow her, in memory to hold his hand, the way she has always done in life.

I was invited to attend the swearing-in of Reta Jo Lewis today, to be President of the Export-Import Bank. I was not able to attend, however, I congratulate Reta whom I have worked with on many projects over the years. She will be an excellent President and make us all proud!
The halftime production of the #Superbowl was off the scale! The OG rappers reminded us all of the art and style of Hip Hop that can never be forgotten.

Everybody in my 43rd Congressional District, the home of the LA Rams are celebrating their magnificent win! The hard-fought win is an inspiration to us all. We will work together to ensure the citizens of Inglewood benefit from the location of the @RamsNFL in their city.

Hip Hip Hooray! The House of Representatives passed the Postal Service Reform Act of 2022. Trump & his appointee Postmaster DeJoy almost destroyed the Postal Service in an attempt to undermine mail-in balloting. Now it is time to get rid of Postmaster DeJoy!

#PostalServiceReform

I love Whoopi Goldberg, she and I have been friends for many years. She is a highly intelligent, loving and compassionate woman. She would not knowingly do anything to hurt anybody. I support you Whoopi, friends for life.

We don't want to brag but we're the Baddest! The @RamsNFL are going to the #SuperBowl and the game will be happening in my District, the 43rd District! The world will be watching and we will be winning!

6 million Americans have Alzheimer's. By 2050, the total cost of Alzheimer's is expected to surpass 1 trillion dollars. The Center for Medicare & Medicaid Services (@CMSGov) refuses to cover FDA-approved Alzheimer's drug Aduhelm. Why? 

We demand answers.

Whip Clyburn counseled President Biden on the importance of naming an African American woman to the Supreme Court. With the retirement of Justice Breyer, now is his opportunity to do it. There has never been a Black woman on the SCOTUS, now is the time. Biden keep your promise!

This democracy is at stake. Senate GOP refused a carve-out of the filibuster to support voting rights. Voter suppression is targeted at Black Americans, but we are not going anywhere. MLK died in the struggle for Justice & Equality, and there are many of us prepared to die also.

If you are hesitant to believe that Trump is a would-be dictator, just read these papers that Trump was trying to hide from the January 6th Committee, before losing the right to do so.

https://t.co/cF8uP8pMCG

When it comes to a woman‚Äôs right to choose, this SCOTUS is wrong, TX is wrong, MS is wrong.Right-wing AntiVaxxers like Bannon or Taylor Greene love to say ‚Äúmy body my choice‚Äù when it comes to vaccines, yet they refuse to respect a women‚Äôs right to choose. They can all go to hell!

The Supreme Court yesterday, did not back down to Trump, despite 3 Justices being appointed by him! The Supreme Court lived up to its constitutional duty to protect the nation from a President, or any high powered individual, from abusing their power and harming the people.
Due to a family emergency, today's instagram live has been postponed. I will be posting an update soon.

Join me tomorrow at 12:30pm PST as I go LIVE on Instagram for the first time in honor of Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. and his message for democracy. #MLKDay

https://t.co/tesHFw1T2o https://t.co/XNpETt0Ugn

"Our most urgent request to the president of the United States and every member of Congress is to give us the right to vote. Give us the ballot, and we will no longer have to worry the federal government about our basic rights." #MLK 

https://t.co/lp07YGtQzZ

#MLKDay Hey good people, do you want to be remembered as a part of the appalling silence?

It couldn‚Äôt be me! Not now, not ever! https://t.co/npXEYwsa7I

The jury has decided. The killers of Ahmaud Arbery have been sentenced. Arbery was killed in cold blood, in a hate crime. Despite the horror of his murder, his death must not be in vain. His killers deserve their sentence. Let us continue to fight for peace and justice.

Our democracy is at stake. It is imperative that we join in coalition with all who understand that the challenge to our democracy continues at the state & local level, led by Number 45. Our single focus must be on strengthening and maintaining the guarantees of the constitution.

Exactly one year ago, the #January6th insurrectionists attacked the Capitol, inspired by  Donald J. Trump and with one mission: to overturn the 2020 election results. They placed bombs, ravaged through Congress and brought death and destruction to our nation.

One year ago today, our nation experienced an attack on the Capitol that was carried out by the most brazen domestic terrorists in this country, including the Proud Boys, the KKK, Q-Anon, & other white supremacists. We came dangerously close to the imposition of a fascist regime.

My love and respect for Daunte's mother, Katie Wright & father, Aubrey Wright

I had dinner and spent the evening with Katie & Aubrey Wright in Minneapolis while awaiting the verdict in the George Floyd case.

They are wonderful people & certainly deserve justice for their child.

Justice is possible!

Former Officer Kim Potter was found guilty of first and second-degree manslaughter for the killing of Daunte Wright, thanks to the great leadership of Minnesota Attorney General Keith Ellison, in the cases of George Floyd and Daunte Wright.

The world mourns Archbishop Desmond Tutu.

Dedicated fighter against the Apartheid system in South Africa, Nobel peace prize winner in 1984

I had the honor of working with him in SA and in California to divest pension funds from American companies doing business in South Africa.

I am in a state of shock. My dear friend, Jackie Avant, was murdered. This kind and compassionate woman, was a friend to so many and we simply cannot accept what has happened to her. 

My condolences to Clarence, Alex and Nicole. We mourn with you. 

Love, Maxine and Sidney.

My dear friend and colleague Carrie Meek has passed away. 

I am recalling the great times we had together. Carrie was a wonderful public servant, she will be sorely missed. All my love, Rest In Peace Carrie.

Colin Powell served as a four-star Army general, chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff, & Secretary of State. He was a highly accomplished individual who made so many people in this country proud, especially those of us in the Black community. May he rest in peace.

Congratulations to Michael Jordan for his ownership and promotion of diversity and inclusion in NASCAR, and congratulations to @BubbaWallace for his recent NASCAR victory.

Keep competing and keep fighting!
#DayOfTheGirl

Girls all over the world are fighting for respect, education, and a decent quality of life. 

In Afghanistan, the Taliban has doubled down on destroying the rights of women & girls, including education. We stand in solidarity with the women & girls struggling for their rights.

To the corporate media.

Why do you allow Trump to undermine our democracy, by spreading and promoting his election lies?

We can't be serious about honoring the contributions of Hispanic Americans unless and until we fix immigration reform, and Congress preserves DACA.

#HispanicHeritageMonth

If you don‚Äôt have a decent home to lay your head in, take a bath, eat a meal with family and friends, a floor to get on your knees in prayer and a neighbor to bike with, you don‚Äôt live in America.

Housing. Is. Everything.

When observing the treatment of Haitians being chased by border patrol cowboys on horses, I said ‚ÄúI‚Äôm pissed‚Äù during a press conference! 

Definition of pissed: mad as hell and not gonna take it anymore!

Biden finally spoke up about the horrendous mistreatment of Haitians at the border. This admin owes us answers as to how & when it will stop the deportations & allow Haitians their legal right to petition for entry into the U.S. We cannot sweep this under the rug! We want action!

Leave women alone! The Texas legislature voted to interfere with a woman‚Äôs right to choose & they‚Äôre rewarding vigilantes for coming after women & their doctors. Today, I voted to pass the Women‚Äôs Health Protection Act. Governor Abbott, this one‚Äôs for you! #LeaveWomenAlone

Haitians fleeing violence & the lack of a credible government in Haiti are being treated like animals. U.S. government cowboys on horses used whips on Haitians as they sought refuge. Why are we following the Trump policies? This horrendous treatment of Haitians must STOP NOW.

My dear friend, Archbishop Carl Bean, the founder of Minority AIDS Project LA & a leader who helped awaken America to the AIDS pandemic, has passed. We worked together to initiate minority AIDS funding in the federal budget that has helped save countless lives. RIP my friend.

Celebrating Labor Day? Let‚Äôs celebrate by using our collective influence to make work pay livable wages to every worker. No less than $20 per hour, paid leave, unemployment insurance, healthcare, pension plans, and RESPECT!

The Supreme Court's FAILURE to stop Texas' attack on women's reproductive rights is a slap in the face & if legislators in Texas think women will abide by this disgusting law, they've got another thing coming. We aren't your objects & we won't be silenced. Our bodies, our choice!

My heart breaks for the families of the service members & Afghans we lost in today‚Äôs attack in Kabul. While we‚Äôre committed to evacuating all Americans, we can‚Äôt trust the Taliban or allow ISIS to take the lives of our soldiers. They must be held to account. Period.

President Biden is committed to getting all Americans who want to get out of Afghanistan, out. There are those who doubt him‚Ä¶ I don‚Äôt! 

We got over 21,000 people out yesterday and the President is going to see to it the others are evacuated in a matter of days! Keep the faith!

It‚Äôs 5:55. We‚Äôre on the floor of Congress voting on the John Lewis Voting Rights Advancement Act. The Republicans are mouthing support for voter suppression in mostly Black districts. Democrats are going to beat them today, pass John‚Äôs bill, & take up the fight in the Senate!

I am devastated by the news that Haiti has been hit by a 7.2 earthquake. At a time when Haiti is without an organized government and suffering greatly from COVID-19, the damage is unspeakable. We must do everything we can to get humanitarian support to Haiti now!

With Haiti dealing with the aftermath of this earthquake, I ask the people of our country to stand with Haiti and do everything possible to make sure there is food, water, and vaccines at this very difficult time. The people of Haiti are in my prayers.

Fighting to insist states & cities do a much better job with the $46.6 BILLION we sent to them for rental assistance. Repeating my tweet from July 31, I‚Äôm going to fight until my last breath to protect the renters & the landlords - the small landlords in particular!

One of the greatest labor leaders in the country has died. Trumka was not only a friend to me & so many others who have fought for years to support organized labor & the ability to protect working people, but he was a forceful, unapologetic voice that resonated around the world.

So proud of @Simone_Biles who has displayed courage, confidence, & extraordinary talent! Some have said our young people aren't using all of their God-given intellect & talent for success, but they're wrong! It doesn't get any better than what Simone has shown us. You go, girl!

My colleagues & I just accomplished something life changing for families & children who were facing eviction. The CDC‚Äôs extension of the moratorium is a temporary solution, but we‚Äôll keep working so everyone has a roof over their head. Emergency rental $$ must get out ASAP!

The Supreme Court DID NOT rule on or even take up the case on the legality of the CDC eviction moratorium. Every minute wasted means another family could be forced onto the streets. Biden, #ExtendTheMoratorium now!

It‚Äôs late, but I won‚Äôt rest while we face an #EvictionEmergency! I just sent a letter to @SpeakerPelosi standing with her in our demand that Biden immediately direct the CDC to extend the eviction moratorium. This isn‚Äôt just a moral imperative, it‚Äôs a public health imperative! https://t.co/3Viet8O055

I don't buy that the CDC can't extend the eviction moratorium - something it has already done in the past! Who is going to stop them? Who is going to penalize them? There is no official ruling saying that they cannot extend this moratorium. C'mon CDC - have a heart! Just do it!
I‚Äôm NOT stopping! I‚Äôm going to fight until my last breath in order to protect these renters and these small landlords. Extend the #EvictionMoratorium! https://t.co/TH8VyfVzIS

I am leading the effort to protect renters. The eviction moratorium ends in TWO DAYS! I'm pulling out all the stops right now in Congress to STOP people from being evicted from their homes! The House MUST pass my bill to extend the eviction moratorium. I am in it to win it!

It is well known by people who follow my career that I exposed LAPD Chief Daryl Gates on his police force‚Äôs use of the chokehold. I‚Äôm not new to this, I‚Äôm true to this! I‚Äôm proud of the reputation I have for fighting for my district!

New Attorney General. Biden Administration. Time for Action!

Today, I sent a letter requesting the Biden Administration investigate the Executioners Gang in the L.A. Sheriff‚Äôs Department. A sheriff gangsta can't stop a street gangsta! The time to act is now.

Today is #NelsonMandelaDay! Had he lived, he would be 103 yrs old. As a legislator in California, I was able to have a bill signed that divested Calif. pension funds from corporations doing business in South Africa. We got Mandela released from prison & ended apartheid!

Today, I'm in San Diego with a Congressional delegation led by @SpeakerPelosi for the christening of the U.S. Naval Ship John Lewis. There will be many memorials and honors that will be given to him because of his tremendous contributions to the world! What a man, what a life.

Enough talk about homelessness and a lack of affordable housing! Now is the time to do something about it. Housing IS Infrastructure and there should be no infrastructure bill without it. Are you with me? #HousingIsInfrastructure

The governor of Texas should think twice about wanting to arrest legally elected officials chosen by the people to represent them in the Texas legislature. This goes beyond undermining our democracy. This is tantamount to the destruction of our democratic processes!

Democrats are fighting back! I am standing with the Texas Democrats who came to Washington, DC in order to stop Republicans from passing voter suppression laws! As democracy hangs in the balance, they are showing TRUE leadership.

I am with them! We will fight back!

GREAT News! A new #ChildTaxCredit program helping to end child poverty. Starting July 15: $250-$300 per child (depending on age) per month! The greatest public policy ever developed on behalf of our children in this country! Have questions? Go to: https://t.co/cybNGJc2Rm!
My statement on the assassination of President Jovenel Mo√Øse of Haiti: https://t.co/hMEFbsxGrm

Further, the Dec. of Ind. says we hold these truths to be "self-evident"... yet:
- 17 states have enacted voter suppression laws
- Supreme Court gutted Sec. 5 of the Voting Rights Act
- George Floyd, Breonna Taylor, Michael Brown, Sandra Bland, Tamir Rice

Need I say more? #July4

July 4th... & so, the Declaration of Independence says all men are created equal. Equal to what? What men? Only white men? Isn't it something that they wrote this in 1776 when African Americans were enslaved? They weren't thinking about us then, but we're thinking about us now!

I was in Tulsa commemorating 100 years since the Tulsa race massacre. If there is any misunderstanding about why reparations are needed, you can't have a better example than the massacre that took lives & burned down Black businesses. Don't you think reparations are fair enough? https://t.co/REC8UNnEOD

Republicans are brazenly sweeping the January 6 insurrection under the rug and have no shame in attacking our right to vote! We need to take action & do it NOW. Investigate Trump & his campaign for January 6, end the filibuster, & save our democracy. History is on OUR side!

Senate Republicans who claim to be such patriots just blocked debate on the #ForThePeopleAct, a bill that would help protect our right to vote. What the hell?!? Republicans across the U.S. are doing all they can to stay in power & it's clear: if they can't win, they WILL cheat!

We need to investigate who funded the January 6 rally, who helped pay to bus people into Washington, D.C., the role of shell companies, and so much more. 

If Republicans have nothing to hide, then let‚Äôs investigate and follow the money through a January 6 Commission now!

Take a look at all of the people listed on the National Park Service permit for the January 6 rally that led to the attack on the Capitol. It should be concerning that FEC reports show the Trump Campaign, at some point, paid over $2.7 MILLION to people who helped organize Jan. 6!

Logged on to Twitter only to see that my haters have me trending again! Does the truth make you that mad? I‚Äôll say it again: Trump and his campaign must be investigated for the January 6th insurrection. Follow the money!

On Father's Day, I salute fathers everywhere! And for those fathers who have a need to reconnect, I urge you and support you to do so. Fathers need to know their specialness, and today children can tell them in so many different ways. Happy #FathersDay!

The best way to celebrate #Juneteenth is to get focused, get educated, and realize we are in a fight to protect our right to vote. 14 states are already trying to advance voter suppression laws, and that number will only grow. Let‚Äôs celebrate, but let's act. End the filibuster!
I announced the signing of the #Juneteenth bill with @SpeakerPelosi and other members of @TheBlackCaucus! Happy Juneteenth! https://t.co/9R9XqVblOk

We're bringing home the money! Today, @VP, @SecYellen, @MarkWarner, @OppFinance, & I announced the release of $1.25 BILLION in funding for minority banks & community-based lenders. This will strengthen our communities & support small & minority-owned businesses. Feeling great! https://t.co/qGGwWbG4il

Happy #PRIDE! This month (& always) we acknowledge & uplift the experience of LGBTQ+ individuals & say to every member of the community: you are loved & supported.

The House passed the #EqualityAct. It‚Äôs time for the Senate to do the same. Words are nice, action is better!

Last weekend, @sharonstone & I helped break ground on The AIDS Monument 40 years after the CDC confirmed the first AIDS case in the U.S. 

Monuments like this remind us of our history, but it is our responsibility to honor that history by working to end HIV/AIDS once & for all. https://t.co/i1drRp6WD2

I have spent the month of May joining with others to celebrate the AAPI community and confront the injustices AAPI people are facing. As hatred against so many groups escalates, the people of this country must stand up against hate in all of its forms.

Spent the day in Tulsa on a panel to discuss moving forward with reparations to compensate for the massacre that took place against the Black people of Greenwood. It is time for justice for the families and the descendants. As the Chairwoman of @FSCDems, I am going to do my part.

Wars are costly in dollars and cents, but more costly in the loss of human lives. Today we honor and give thanks to those who made the ultimate sacrifice, but say no thanks to more wars. As we think future, let us think peace.

Today marks 1 year since George Floyd was murdered. We must always remember the 9+ minutes that Chauvin kneeled on his neck & we must be committed to holding police accountable. George Floyd & others who have met similar fates must not have died in vain. The struggle continues.

To work for HeadStart was a defining moment in my life! It is one of the best government programs that truly gives families the opportunity to prepare their children for the educational experience. Happy Birthday to HeadStart!  #HappyBDayHeadStart

Fox News told a lie about my security & travel that has led to even more death threats against me. I responded with the truth. It is no coincidence that Fox News doesn‚Äôt have the decency to tell its audience that the story is a lie. 

Fox is loud about everything but the truth!
Fox News - you can't prove the lies that you have told about me. In the final analysis, you will be proven to have been exactly what you are: irresponsible, dangerous liars.

The latest Fox "News" campaign against me falsely claiming that I requested police, secret service, & air marshals on an April 17 flight is an absolute lie. I have never requested law enforcement protection on my flights. Deceitful, lying Fox "News" must be stopped.

My dear @RepBeatty, praying for you to be healthy and strong during this time of pain and sorrow.
